about_the_game:
Pave your own path with the ability to freely manipulate floating platforms!

Lumi: Starbound Adventure offers a thrilling 3D action-adventure platformer experience where you step into the shoes of Lumi, tasked with saving her world from an imminent invasion. Lumi is accompanied by Athena, a celestial being who takes the form of a talking gauntlet.

Embark on a journey that challenges you to leap, solve, and battle your way through diverse and intriguing environments. Lumi and Athena's bond is your key to unlocking the mysteries and overcoming the obstacles that await. Their dynamic offers more than just assistance; Athena's sharp wit adds a layer of depth and enjoyment to your adventure.

Explore 5 huge vibrant worlds with fun adventures around every corner. Your mission is clear: collect the scattered pieces of the Sentinel's sword, facing down formidable foes and solving puzzles that test your wit and resolve.

Lumi: Starbound Adventure is about the synergy between a hero and her celestial partner against the backdrop of a universe in peril. Join them on this concise yet captivating quest to thwart darkness with every shard you secure and every challenge you conquer.

The stunning world of Lumi awaits! Are you ready for a Starbound Adventure?

short_description: Pave your own path as Lumi in this charming 3D platformer that lets you freely manipulate floating platforms! With Athena, a sentient gauntlet sidekick, you'll solve puzzles, traverse fantastical worlds, and fight an emerging evil in a starbound adventure like no other!
